00039    class IconEntry {
00040    public:
00042       IconEntry( const MC2String& name,
00043                  const MC2String& clientID,
00044                  int xsize,
00045                  int ysize )
00046             : m_name(name),
00047               m_clientID( clientID ),
00048               m_xsize(xsize),
00049               m_ysize(ysize) {}
00051       int getXSize() const { return m_xsize; }
00053       int getYSize() const { return m_ysize; }
00055       const MC2String& getIconName() const { return m_name; }
00057       const MC2String& getClientID() const { return m_clientID; }
00059       friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& o, const IconEntry& icon ) {
00060          return o << MC2CITE(icon.m_name)
00061                   << ", " << MC2CITE(icon.m_clientID)
00062                   << ", " << icon.m_xsize
00063                   << ", " << icon.m_ysize;
00064       }
00065    private:
00066       MC2String m_name;
00067       MC2String m_clientID;
00068       int m_xsize;
00069       int m_ysize;
00070    };
